scripts.postinstall: git update-index --assume-unchanged playground/* && bun task install-libs
scripts.test: bun task check-libs-integrity && env $(echo $(cat .env.defaults && echo && cat .env) | xargs) forge test
scripts.playground: env $(echo $(cat .env.defaults && echo && cat .env) | xargs) FOUNDRY_TEST=playground forge test --match-path playground/Playground.t.sol --match-contract Playground
scripts.echidna: cp -R test/fuzzing src/_fuzzing && trap 'rm -rf src/_fuzzing; exit' INT && echidna . --contract Fuzz --config echidna-config.yaml --workers 5; rm -rf src/_fuzzing
